channel.title: Cargo on Nazarii Sheremet
channel.description: Recent content in Cargo on Nazarii Sheremet

item.title: My first Rust Experience
item.description: Hi guys. Two weeks ago I started to learn Rust, for better learning, I decided to rewrite my library mruby-smallhttp on Rust. Let’s get to know Cargo. It’s something like bundler in Ruby world. $ cargo new library # => generate a template for project $ tree # => library ├── Cargo.toml └── src └── lib.rs Cargo.toml it’s a manifest file. If you want to know more about how to get started in Rust, here is the link.
